items.name: Recombinant Alcohol Dehydrogenase (RADH)
items.production_organism: E. coli BL21(DE3) from Novagen, Madison, WI
items.purification_method: Size exclusion chromatography (SEC), anion exchange chromatography, additional SEC
items.special_treatment: Multiple storage conditions tested, including desalting buffer, glycerol mix, and freeze-drying.
